title: Mt. Fuji from Ohito
marks: Signature, Title, Inscription, Mark, Seal, and Lab LLC, in pencil: [Mt. Fuji from Ohito, Autumn]; LRC
description: autumnal landscape: amber and green colored plots of farmland in lower half of scene dotted with small houses and farm buildings; blue river separates farmland from orange, red, green, and purple hills; snow-covered Mt. Fuji in background against a yellow sky
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
